Reviews.Title: Nice for prepaid.
Reviews.Author: Northern Shorty "Jess"
Reviews.Content: This phone is halfway decent for a prepaid phone. My only complaint so far has been the battery life isn't the greatest, but its manageable. The camera works well, call quality is good, overall a decent smartphone for prepaid, definitely one of Straight Talk's better phones. One thing about the specs listed on this page...the phone has a 1 GHz processor, not 800 MHz. As the other reviewer has said, if you plan on getting this phone, shop around a little. Wal-Mart stores sell it for $199.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Devon Wilson
Reviews.Content: This phone has to be the best prepaid verizon phone on straight talk..I came from a galaxy proclaim,which was sturdy and got the job done,but this phone is a few steps up..The service is near flawless(verizon) and the specs are top notch for a prepaid..The price on this phone is too high,but shop around for a deal..You will not be sorry, unless your just a hard a******. satisfaction a +++++

Reviews.Title: As good as a contact phone!
Reviews.Author: nyvet
Reviews.Content: This is actually better than previous CONTRACT phones I've had! Got one of the first ones at Walmart last year, on Verizon network so it works everywhere, and to this day, a year later, I still love this phone and it hasn't let me down or disappointed me yet. Highly recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Best Straight Talk Phone I've had
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Android 4.0, large screen, Verizon Network coverage . . . screen is 4.3 so it's easy to see and use.  Only problem I see with it is the phone is hard to get, but if you can find an L86C, to me and my wife it was worth paying a little more.

Reviews.Title: Pricey
Reviews.Author: Audrey Ennis
Reviews.Content: This phone is a little on the pricey side.Even with the card, which has only 7 months left it should be cheaper for a used phone.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Vieira "Gloomy Gray Gay Guy"
Reviews.Content: Great phone. shipping was quick. It is my first touch screen. I was concerned about touching the wrong keys by mistake. However, unlike other phones I've tried, I have very few mistakes when touching keys. When touching keys when sending messages, it momentarily flashes a large graphic of the key you touched. The phone is very intuitive and fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced on here.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Stiverson "stivey"
Reviews.Content: It is Kind of pricey on here. You can get new for $199.00 and refurb for $99.00 now a days.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Judy Brunner
Reviews.Content: Well first of all, I ordered a optimus show time, then they sent me a different phone, that I couldn't even use in my area, took that back to wal mart, ordered another Optimus show time, & that one got damaged in mail, so u had to send me the Optimus extreme, so not really satisfied, because I wanted a5" screen, cause need something bigger. Had to do without a cell for about 2-3 weeks till I finally got one, but you said didn't have o more Optimus show time phones. So IDK !!!,
